website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to style and value, these leather gloves can't be topped, offering good looks and warm, soft wear at a fraction of the price you'd expect.
pros: Soft Nappa sheepskin leather gloves available in numerous attractive colors
An affordable way to stay warm and stylish during the winter
Wool-cashmere blend lining makes them soft inside, too
cons: Reports of them running too small

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Interior lining cheap and scratchy couldn't get my thumb in the glove the lining stopped short
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but touch screen doesn't work w/ these
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are really cute and kept my hands warm while I played in snow this past weekend, but I've tried two different pairs and they only barely work when I'm using my phone. Some of the fingers work better than others and some of them don't work at all. I got one pair and figured it was defective but the second pair I got also only somewhat works with touchscreens. I decided to keep them because I don't have any gloves and these still are cute and keep my hands warm, but if you're looking for gloves that specifically allow for touch screen usage, these aren't the best pair for that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: First, I’d like to say that I ordered these yesterday and they came this morning, so I’m DEFINITELY pleased with that. As far as the product, I waited until I finished my errands for the day and I must say that I LOVE these gloves! They fit PERFECTLY (I like them snug to hold in body heat) and kept me warm all day.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: They run small and get cold at cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: They do not protect well from cold, actually, they get cold! I just tried them in NYC at 26F degrees! They run a little small. Other than that they are and look great. Soft and light material.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: WARM AND BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gloves. I purchased one pair in brown and went back and purchased another in black. These gloves are warm and beautiful. You will not be disappointed with your purchase in my opinion. I wish I had a need for all the colors as I love classy looking gloves and warm too. It is -30 with the wind chill and these gloves are fabulous. I wear a size 7 and they fit perfectly. The gloves were professionally wrapped and packaged. Can't say enough good things about this purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Lunn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not warm
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and feel good on the hand but are definitely not warm for winter conditions. Certainly nothing below 50 degrees. Would make a nice glove for chilly fall days. I bought these for driving gloves but they trapped the cold in and couldn't bare to wear for more than a minute. For people with poor circulation or Raynaud's syndrome do not buy for winter.
customer_reviews.author: c.g

customer_reviews.title: Classy gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are absolutely the best gloves I have ever had! The fit is true to size (Hand size same as shoe size) for me. the cashmere and wool lining is so soft and warm its incredibly. I love these gloves and will order a 2nd pair the price is right for sheep skin cashmere
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a winter business trip..
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy these gloves considering I was kind of blind to the sizing. I was winging it and purchased size medium. They fit. I can’t say my hands are small but they aren’t large either, medium was just big enough and the finger pads work on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: JohannaMMMmm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE,LOVE,LOVE these gloves!!!!

customer_reviews.author: Tracy's Review

customer_reviews.title: Super soft leather, meant for spring or fall, not winter
customer_reviews.text: Very soft inside and out but definitely gloves to wear in the fall or spring while walking the dog, running errands or driving. NOT that warm. Id say 80%fashion and 20%warmth. Which is fine, just letting you know these are great quality leather but more so for warmer climates, not winter
customer_reviews.author: Shockey

customer_reviews.title: I want a pair in every color

The conductivity of the fingertips was good enough to use the phone functions, but I'm not proficient enough at texting to try that with these on. I would love if I could get a pair in bright red in my size; I'll see if that's an option this season.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Iphone
customer_reviews.text: They gloves are really nice and warm for winter here in NYC, but the gloves aren't effective on the home button. They work on the touch screen, but you have to take your glove off to use your finger to unlock the Iphone. I'm really bummed, but because they are warm I will probably still keep them as regular gloves.

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I did because although they seemed tight in ...
